name: Daydreamer: Awakened Edition
description: Daydreamer is a classic platformer focused around Boss fights, blowing up Aliens and Robots, and using speed and abilities to evade attacks as you traverse mind-blowing alien landscapes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 Processor: Intel Core i3 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 6600 or better Storage: 1340 MB available space Sound Card: Direct Sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 Processor: Intel Core i3 or better Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 7670M 1GB  or better Storage: 1340 MB available space Sound Card: Direct Sound

reviews.review_text: Extremely mind-blowing creative graphics in this game, and great maze-like challenges on multiple levels. An interesting 'Spirit Guide' following you everywhere gives this game an edge unrivaled by most games of this type. Very cool!
